metadata.title: CVE-2017-14412 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An invalid memory write was discovered in copy_mp in interface.c inmpglibDBL, as used in MP3Gain version 1.5.2. The vulnerability causes adenial of service (segmentation fault and application crash) or possiblyunspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
